 Blindfear::
Blindfear was struk by the missiles.
"If the kid is in the battlefield instead the nursery, then is a warrior and he can take care himself"said sarcastic Blindfear who fired two missiles one to orion and other to Sideswipe
  Alloran2@... wrote: :::Orion/Sideswipe::: 

::He was caught off guard by Blindfear, getting hit by most of the shots. As he fell, Sideswipe saw and came to his aid:: 
Sideswipe: Leave the kid alone! 
::He fires 2 missles at Blindfear::
